Name: hashicorp
Command: uv run mcp-validate --json-report output/terraform-mcp-server.json -- podman run -i --rm quay.io/validated-mcp-servers/terraform-mcp-server:20250809-13ef8d0

Name: dynatrace-oss
Command: uv run mcp-validate --env DT_ENVIRONMENT=https://test.apps.dynatrace.com --env OAUTH_CLIENT_ID=test-client-id --env OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET=test-client-secret --env DT_PLATFORM_TOKEN=test-token --env SLACK_CONNECTION_ID=test-connection-id --json-report output/dynatrace.json -- podman run -i --rm quay.io/validated-mcp-servers/dynatrace:0.5.0-rc.2

Name: redis
Command: uv run mcp-validate --env REDIS_HOST=127.0.0.1 --env REDIS_PORT=6379 --env REDIS_DB=0 --env REDIS_USERNAME=default --env REDIS_PWD=test-password --env REDIS_SSL=False --env REDIS_CERT_REQS=required --env REDIS_CLUSTER_MODE=False --json-report output/redis.json -- podman run -i --rm quay.io/validated-mcp-servers/redis:version0.3.0

Name: redis-cloud
Command: uv run mcp-validate --env API_KEY=test-api-key --env SECRET_KEY=test-secret-key --json-report output/redis-cloud.json -- podman run -i --rm quay.io/validated-mcp-servers/redis-cloud:1.0.0

Name: Couchbase-Ecosystem
Command: uv run mcp-validate --env CB_CONNECTION_STRING=couchbase://localhost --env CB_USERNAME=test-user --env CB_PASSWORD=test-password --env CB_BUCKET_NAME=test-bucket --env CB_MCP_READ_ONLY_QUERY_MODE=true --env CB_MCP_TRANSPORT=stdio --json-report output/mcp-server-couchbase.json -- podman run -i --rm quay.io/validated-mcp-servers/mcp-server-couchbase:0.4.0

Name: elastic
Command: uv run mcp-validate --env ES_URL=http://localhost:9200 --env ES_API_KEY=test-api-key --env ES_USERNAME=test-user --env ES_PASSWORD=test-password --env ES_SSL_SKIP_VERIFY=true --json-report output/elasticsearch.json -- podman run -i --rm quay.io/validated-mcp-servers/elasticsearch:20250809-5014d91 stdio

Name: jfrog
Command: uv run mcp-validate --env JFROG_ACCESS_TOKEN=test-access-token --env JFROG_URL=https://test.jfrog.com --env TRANSPORT=stdio --env PORT=8080 --env 'CORS_ORIGIN=*' --env LOG_LEVEL=INFO --env MAX_RECONNECT_ATTEMPTS=5 --env RECONNECT_DELAY_MS=2000 --json-report output/jfrog.json -- podman run -i --rm quay.io/validated-mcp-servers/jfrog:0.0.1
